Header: Youth With Talent promotional tour ends tomorrow
Content: The promotional tour of the programme Youth With Talent Third Generation that changed the Sri Lankan reality tradition proceeded from Ratnapura to Bandaragama via Horana. The promotional tour is being organized by the Independent Television Media Network in collaboration with the National Youth Services Council. Today is the tenth day of the Youth With Talent Third Generation promotional tour. The Youth With Talent Reality programme has now become the genuine reality of the Sri Lankan youth that has astonished the world with determination. The promotional tour reached Eheliyaogda yesterday via Kegalle from Gampaha. The Youth With Talent Promotional tour will draw to a close tomorrow and the final ceremony is planned to be held at the National Youth Centre in Maharagama.
